attributes.action: Can we have our country back please?
attributes.additional_details:
We, the undersigned are sick of the scrounging, work shy, lazy, mindless thugs who are destroying the very fabric of communities and mocking our tolerant nature.

The London riots should serve as a wake up call to the Nation - we have got to crack down on crime. WE are the victims here - the hard working decent men & women of this country.
